settings._comment1: Folder name to save things to, leave null for unnamed run
settings._comment2: Whether to timestamp the above folder for easy recording of data
settings._comment3: Force all random seeds to be some equal value stored at graph savetime
settings._comment4: Whether to save state information DEPRECATED AS THIS SETTING IS AVAILABLE PER PROCESS
settings._comment5: Seed Value, currently only for recording purposes
settings._comment6: Amount of times run, usually paird with force_seed to set a random seed for n runs

graph._comment: the name of the graph function (found in GRAPH_FUNCTIONS under parser.py)
graph._comment2: the appropriate arguments for said function
graph._comment3: a list of settings that apply specifically to the graph

settings._comment_normalise: whether to ensure that the in-degree is 1 (or 0 for edgeless nodes)
settings._comment_store_graph: Whether to store the adjacency matrix of the graph to a file (usually true, but can't presume)
settings._comment_couple: The self-coupling value of the adjacency matrix

_comment_processes: Each process' result is stored and used in post_processing information

settings._comment_filter: Select data to not record when running this process, usually done to save space

processes._comment1: An Euler implementation of O-U process

settings._comment_filter: Select data to not record when running this process, usually done to save space

processes._comment1: Covariance Calculation, not a stochastic process
